name: Daniel Redclief
testimony: Was very aggressive in my case. Very hand son and communicative. Been involved with Andrew for 5 years. Im thankful for all the information and support he's given me. Highly recommend

name: Leonardo DiCaprio
testimony: Saul is wonderful! They helped make, what to me, seemed like a really scary process not as scary. I would recommend them to anyone needing to go through a bankruptcy or for any business matter

name: Benzamin Ronaldo
testimony: I was not sure at first if Ben will be able to win my case, but he really proved me wrong. He's a beast in defending his client. He is really one of the great lawyers I worked with
